description: Obtains the manual snapshot limits for a directory.

parameters.name: DirectoryId
parameters.description: Contains the identifier of the directory to obtain the limits for.

nested_items.name: SnapshotLimits
nested_items.description: A  SnapshotLimits object that contains the manual snapshot limits for the specified directory.

nested_items.name: ManualSnapshotsLimit
nested_items.description: The maximum number of manual snapshots allowed.

nested_items.name: ManualSnapshotsCurrentCount
nested_items.description: The current number of manual snapshots of the directory.

nested_items.name: ManualSnapshotsLimitReached
nested_items.description: Indicates if the manual snapshot limit has been reached.
